category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: GMS_UID_mapping_remote_site_index
preference.preference_description: Lists the index mapping for remote Teamcenter Enterprise sites involved in data exchange. The indexes are used for generating unique object UIDs in PLM XML. Valid Values: Enter values as instance-name:index1, for example, svli60:1.
